ISSUE.TITLE: 'workspace' section overrides base folder entirely
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hey, I have a docker image with some folders under `/go` ```bash ls /go bin pkg src ``` If in my drone manifest I put the `workspace` section such: ```yml workspace: base: /go path: src/bitbucket.org/my/project ``` Then the `/go` folder gets overridden entirely and contains only the `/go/src` folder. ```bash ls /go src ``` Drone should not remove the folder rather put the workspace's path under the base folder. (If I remove the 'workspace' section everything work as expected) Thanks.
